files.description: Setup script for the Quran search application. Uses setuptools to configure package details, version, packages, and installation requirements.
List of package requirements for the Quran search application. Currently empty, serving as a placeholder for future dependencies.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Parses each line into a dictionary containing surah number, ayah number, and verse text, and handles file not found errors gracefully.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file line by line, parses lines formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text' into dictionaries, and returns a list of these dictionaries. Handles FileNotFoundError by printing an error message.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words and phrases in the loaded Quran data. Provides functions for various search operations with support for case-sensitive and case-insensitive comparisons.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses by iterating over the data and returning verses that contain the specified word based on case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case-sensitive, default False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses, allowing for case-sensitive or case-insensitive comparisons.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group or phrase to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case-sensitive, default False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific surah in the Quran data, filtering verses by surah number and performing a case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word group (phrase) within a specific surah of the Quran data, returning verses that contain the word group with respect to case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group or phrase to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The surah number to filter the verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case-sensitive, default False.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data using load_quran_text from quran_data_loader and performs search operations using functions from quran_search. It orchestrates reading the Quran text and displaying search results.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data and perform search operations. It loads the Quran text, performs word and word group searches, and prints the results.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.
Unit tests for the Quran search functionalities. Contains a test suite that verifies search functions for both word and word group searches, including case-sensitive and case-insensitive scenarios.
